About.title: My Journey as a Frontend Developer
About.textOne: Began my MBA studies in Project Management.
About.textTwo: Discovered web development through the lens of a technical project manager.
About.textThree: Decided to explore the development side of web development.
About.textFour: Learned extensively through online resources and committed to coding.
About.textFive: Started learning web development with Scrimba's Career Path.
About.textEight: Front-end Developer and Product Owner at Chingu
About.textNine: Project Coordinator and Front-end Developer at The Collab Lab
About.textTen: Became a certified front-end developer from Meta and continue to expand my skills.

Projects.title: My Creative Portfolio
Projects.0: My portfolio, built with Next.js, MongoDB, DaisyUI, Framer Motion, Tailwind CSS, and Lenis, showcases interactive projects, seamless animations, and a smooth user experience.
Projects.1: GrocerEase is a web app built with React, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn UI. It offers smart shopping lists, personalized reminders, and prioritizes items based on your shopping habits for efficiency.
Projects.2: GourmetGo is a mobile-first single-page app that simulates a restaurant menu and ordering system, featuring real-time data from the Free Food Menus API and interactive maps.
Projects.3: Dinopedia is a mobile-first web app showcasing dinosaur facts from London’s Natural History Museum. It offers dynamic data rendering and an engaging, user-friendly interface.
Projects.4: Van Life is a user-friendly web app built with React and Firebase, simplifying van rentals for road trips. It offers easy rental management, reviews, profile updates, and a personalized, efficient experience.
